name: Night Lines
description:
Night Lines Is A Puzzle Game About Staying In Shadow,

Touching The Light Will Shatter You Into A Hundred Pieces (I've Counted)

So Avoid It At All Costs.

Do Schoolwork? Nah

Make A Game In One Day? Hell Yea!

This Game Was Made For The Dani's Basement Game Jam 4

Imma Be Late To School Tomorrow
